learnMore.description: Used in links such as in code setting descriptions

learnMoreAbout.description: Used in links such as 'Learn more about Creative Commons'

by.description: Used in phrases like '[Sketch Title] by [User name]'

eg.description: Used to give examples with e.g. (for example)'

edit.description: navigation - when info panel is selected

signin.description: link label for sign in page

signout.description: link label for sign out page

join.description: link label asking users to join the website

joinPlus.description: link label asking users to join the Plus+ Membership

search.description: Placeholder text when search icon is clicked

mode-HTMLCSS.description: Shows when user selects pjs mode
mode-HTMLCSS.en: Write HTML, CSS, and JS as you wish.
mode-HTMLCSS.pt: Escreva HTML, CSS e JS como desejar.

mode-pjs.description: Shows when user selects pjs mode

mode-applet.description: Shows when user selects an legacy Applet mode
mode-applet.en: Java doesn't work in browsers anymore.
mode-applet.pt: Java não funciona mais em navegadores.

liveCollaborationDescription-tutorial.en: Live Collaboration is not supported on tutorials.
liveCollaborationDescription-tutorial.pt: Colaboração Ao Vivo não é suportado em tutoriais.

liveCollaborationDescription-singleTab.description: Shows when sketch has multiple tabs
liveCollaborationDescription-singleTab.en: Live Collaboration is only supported on sketches with single tab.
liveCollaborationDescription-singleTab.pt: Colaboração Ao Vivo é suportado apenas em esboços com abas únicas.

liveCollaborationDescription-save.description: Shows when it is a new sketch (not saved)
liveCollaborationDescription-save.en: Please save your sketch to enable.
liveCollaborationDescription-save.pt: Por favor, salve o esboço para habilitar.

liveCollaborationDescription-shareURL.en: Share the URL with your class to code together.
liveCollaborationDescription-shareURL.pt: Compartilhe a URL da sua aula com o código junto.

liveCollaborationDescription-default.description: Shows when it can be enabled
liveCollaborationDescription-default.en: Invite your class to code together.
liveCollaborationDescription-default.pt: Convide sua turma para programar juntos.

showcaseSketchDescription.en: Centers sketch and matches the background color.
showcaseSketchDescription.pt: Centralizar esboço e corresponder a cor de fundo.

loopProtectDescription.en: Prevents infinite loops that may freeze the sketch.
loopProtectDescription.pt: Previne lanços infinitos que podem congelar seu esboço.

pasteURL.description: text input placeholder when adding a custom library
pasteURL.pt: Colar URL ou nome do arquivo

saveToUpload.en: Save or fork the sketch to upload files.
saveToUpload.pt: Salve ou bifurque seu esboço para enviar arquivos.

layoutDescription.en: This will be the default layout for your sketches
layoutDescription.pt: Este será a visualização padrão para seus esboços

consoleDescription.en: It will show up when there is an error or print() in code
consoleDescription.pt: Será exibido quando houver um erro ou print() no código

lintingDescription.en: Potential warnings will be displayed as you type
lintingDescription.pt: Avisos em potencial serão exibidos conforme você digita

lintingDescription-p5js.description: code settings > editor. Shows when sketch is not p5js.
lintingDescription-p5js.en: Disabled: Only available on p5js sketches.
lintingDescription-p5js.pt: Desabilitado: Disponível somente nos esboços de p5js.

versionsSummarized.description: code settings > versions. Displayed when sketch has more than 20 versions.
versionsSummarized.en: Prior to most recent 20 versions are summarized.
versionsSummarized.pt: Prévia das 20 versões mais recentes são resumidas.

plusPromo.description: code settings > promo. Displayed at the bottom if user is not a Plus+ member
plusPromo.en: {0} to add custom libraries, private sketches, and more!
plusPromo.pt: {0} adicionar mais bibliotecas personalizadas, esboços privados, e mais!

license-needPlus.description: info > edit panel. Displayed below license if user is not a Plus+ member

draftDescription.en: won't be listed on feeds but still accessible on your profile

privacy-classesDescription.en: only the students and teachers in your classes

privacy-teachersDescription.en: only the teachers in your classes

privateURLDescription.en: You can share your sketch with this URL even if it is set hidden above

privateURL-pleaseSave.en: Please save your sketch to create private URL

membershipDescription.description: Edit Profile > label. Should use variable {membershipType} instead of 'Plus+'
membershipDescription.en: Make changes or cancel your {membershipType} Membership

notificationsDescription.en: Select when to receive email notifications
notificationsDescription.ja: モードモードモードモード
notificationsDescription.pt: Selecione quando receber notificações por email

deleteAccountDescription.en: Just like you'd shoot it with lasers
deleteAccountDescription.pt: Somente se você for atirar com lasers

sketches.ja: 0 モード | 1 モード | {n} モード

classes.ja: 0 モード | 1 モード | {n} モード

curations.ja: 0 モード | 1 モード | {n} モード

hearts.description: Tab. Due to copyrights, this phrase should not be anything close to 'like'. Please stick to 'hearts' as in 'you have a place in my heart'
hearts.ja: 0 モード | 1 モード | {n} モード

followers.ja: 0 モード | 1 モード | {n} モード
